message: Let's start fair.  I'll take most of the money, but I'm willing to give you a little to get the ball rolling.
Alice, that's a tough start!  Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing a more reasonable split that benefits us both.  This offer won't last forever though!
I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the money more evenly. This is a good deal for both of us, especially with the time ticking away.
Alice, we're running out of time! This offer is my bottom line.  Take it or leave it.
